page.title: 14FURNACE POND SLAUGHAM
page.content: During a survey between 1.00 and 4.30 on Sunday June 16th, 27 groups (80 people) were interviewed. We found people visit the pond to walk, paint, draw, feed the ducks, exercise dogs,climb trees, take photos, fish and have picnics.They also enjoy the attractive view and wildlife. Most people go to Furnace Pond by car and park beside the lake.A lot of visitors came from Brighton and Hove but they also came from Crawley, Cuckfield, Bolney, Horsham,Cranleigh, Burgess Hill, Littlehampton, Lindfield, Oxstead, Haywards Heath, Crawley Down. A few people came from other parts of England and abroad. People of all ages visited the pond and most people had been visiting the pond between 2 and 5 years, some for over 10 years. The busiest time was between 3.00 and 4.00
